vsParam:
Coming, coming,
the door is open.

Hey,
you got a minute now?

Ah, yeah. I'm free now. What's going on?
Your face looks even gloomier than usual...

Nothing... I've come here for a while. Sometimes I'd
inadvertently feel that... you guys are really amazing.
Why do you bring it up all of sudden?

Not all of a sudden,
I'm observing you every day.

I was adopted... I told you that, right? So I always feel that
everything will be good as long as I listen to my father.

And I get to repay him for raising me.
I have no regret for my decision.

However, I've been pondering since I got here.
What is my dream?

Yes. Anise aspires to be an outstanding sage, Sorel a popular and
powerful witch, and Cresson the most powerful knight in the kingdom...
Everyone has a dream.

[px] has a dream too. You said you want to be an
"alchemist who lives up to everyone's expectations".

Uh, yeah...
But, you must have a dream too, Varerian?

Yes. My dream is to repay father's love and kindness for me.
But...

This is not exactly a dream.
It just came to my senses after father pointed it out.

I must find my dream.
This idea occurred to me recently.
I am sure you'll find it!

Uh, yeah!
I'm certain that you'll find your own dream!

No, not now.
I'll come to you when I need your help.

Hee hee, sorry, I said some demoralizing things.
But I just wanted to pour it out to you.

As long as I'm with you guys, I'll find it one day.
I'm not bragging, but my hunch is pretty accurate.

Yeah!
Hee hee, I hope you will find it soon!

OK! I'll let you know once I find it.
That's all I want to say today. I gotta go!

Uh, Varerian also has his own ideas...
Let's hope that he could find a new dream sooner...
